title: Interpretation of the dream of the name Badr in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Badr in a dream. Some names can carry good or bad meanings. Therefore, we learn about the interpretation of a dream about the name Badr in a dream and what good or evil it brings. All of this and more... Interpretation of a dream about the name Badr in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Badr in a dream can be A sign of the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see the name Badr, it expresses goodness and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the name Badr, it may be an indication of goodness and sustenance, and God Almighty is above all things. If an unmarried young man sees the name Badr, it may indicate marriage to a woman of good birth and lineage, and God is Almighty. I know the interpretation of a dream about the name Basil in a dream. The interpretation of dreams about the name Basil in a dream could be an indication of good things, and God knows the unseen, and since if the dreamer sees the name Basil, it could be a sign of overcoming problems and difficulties, and God knows best. When you see a married man, the name Basil may mean that you will overcome On illness, God willing. If a married woman sees the name Basil, this may indicate that she will get a job, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Nawaf in a dream. The name Nawaf can also indicate a person who respects and values ​​others, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Tamim in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Tamim in a dream could be an indication of good character, and God knows the unseen, and in the event that a young man sees the name Tamim. When a pregnant woman sees the name Tamim, it may be an indication of the birth of a well-behaved child, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Afnan in a dream. However, the name Afnan is one of the names that carry good meanings, as it can express superiority and glorification. Therefore, if the dreamer sees the name Afnan, it can lead to goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see the name Afnan, it can be evidence of exaltation and sublimity, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a name Ghazi in a dream. When a single girl sees the name Ghazi, it may indicate striving to achieve goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Ghazi. When You see a married man whose name is Faisal, it can indicate a love of distinction and success, and God is higher and more. Interpretation of a dream about the name Abdul Aziz in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about walking in the street: seeing walking in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about walking on the road indicates the fulfillment of desires and other meanings, and we refer to a single, married, pregnant, divorced, man, such as walking barefoot, walking on a muddy road, walking on water, or walking with someone. I know a long way from Ibn Sirin and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of walking on the street in a dream. The general interpretation of the dream that you are walking on the road is that you are close to reaching your goal and ambition, and if the path you are taking is familiar to you, this means that you will reach the goal soon, and if If the road is dark, you will not get profit from the work you want to do. And if you are walking on a road and there is lighting on the road, you will get pleasure and benefits. If you are walking on a narrow street in a dream, this indicates anxiety about the situation you are in. You may feel that there is no way out, but by exploiting limited capabilities and efforts, you will be able to get out. If you are walking alone in the street, this means that you will live your life in your own way, independent of others, and you may follow a new style in your life that others do not realize. If you You are walking on the road and find a turning, it indicates that the way you are going in life will introduce some new operations.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If you see that you are walking on a black road, this indicates your feelings of anxiety, fears, and depression and that you will go through a difficult period in your life. If you are walking on the road and notice a blockage This road, this may be a warning to you not to continue on the path you are walking in life and that you should pay attention to this warning. And if you find a fork in the road you are walking on, this indicates a change in decisions and positions, and if you enter a turning point, this indicates To indicate that your lifestyle is not planned. If you are walking on a one-way street while walking in the opposite direction, this means that you are challenging everyone’s opinion and taking positions contrary to prevailing positions. If you are walking on the road in reverse, this indicates that you are thinking too much about the past. If You dreamed that you completely crossed the street, this indicates social change and progress that will occur.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: The meaning of tomatoes in a dream or tomatoes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of tomatoes in the vision indicates the arrival of goodness and other meanings, and we mention them for the girl, unmarried, married, or divorced who are pregnant, such as eating tomatoes, or buying ripe red tomatoes from Ibn Sirin and. More later on the topic: Meanings of tomatoes or tomatoes in a dream. Tomatoes in a dream indicate kindness, comfort, happiness, and improved health. Seeing red tomatoes in a dream indicates the emergence of many situations that will positively affect insight, and this vision may indicate problems and experiences.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');According to the interpretation of some scholars, seeing tomatoes in your dream is a sign of goodness, happiness, and the arrival of blessings, and indicates that the dreamer will soon enter into love relationships and marriage. And if You dreamed that you were sick and someone came in and brought you tomatoes, then this vision is good news for recovery and care. If you dream of huge tomatoes, it means that you may see something and be surprised by it. If you dream of a tomato field, it means good deeds and livelihood. If you dream that you lost tomatoes, because It indicates your livelihood, and that you did not find it, this indicates something in which you had no share. If you dream of a can of tomatoes, this means abundant livelihood for those who find it. If a single person dreams of tomatoes, this means that you have no livelihood left, because it is lost quickly, but it It is important in the house, and it may indicate that there is no share in this bride. If you dream that you dropped tomatoes and any food that falls on the ground, this indicates recklessness in life. If you dream that you are eating tomatoes, as you eat tomatoes, or anything that tastes good, then this indicates Goodness and meals as long as they are not sour or spoiled. If you dream that you are harvesting tomatoes and reaping the fruits, this means that you will obtain sustenance according to what you took from them, God willing. Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpreter Muhammad ibn Sirin stated that tomatoes in a dream indicate rest after fatigue and indicate To gain livelihood and money after hard work.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');When you dream of seeing or eating red tomatoes, this dream symbolizes that you can find a way to overcome the obstacles that stand in your way. When you dream of seeing green tomatoes, This dream symbolizes that you will live with a lot of disappointment and face difficult times. Rotten tomatoes in the dream symbolize

title: Interpretation of dreams: I am pregnant with Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was pregnant, what does that mean? Seeing pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried girl makes her feel anxious, confused, and afraid for her future. As for a pregnant woman in a dream, she is happy with this vision. The interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream varies according to the condition of the viewer, and we will learn about all the indicators that the vision carries through this article. I dreamed that I was pregnant. I dreamed that I was pregnant. I dreamed that I was pregnant, so what does that mean? Legal interpreters say that pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman and feeling very sad means that she is in a relationship with a reckless young man who causes her psychological pain and a feeling of extreme anxiety, but if she is pregnant by an unknown woman. Being happy with this matter means earning a lot of money in the coming period. If the dreamer divorces and sees that she is pregnant in her dream, this means that she will return to her ex-husband again and feel very happy and happy with him after a period of separation and sadness. Ibn Shaheen says that pregnancy in a dream is evidence in general. It improves the health and financial condition and a feeling of stability and brings a lot of goodness to the viewer in the case of happiness with the pregnant woman, but it could be a sign of failure in life and that he will face some obstacles in the case of sadness and inability to detect the pregnancy. I dreamed that I was pregnant with Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin says in an interpretation Pregnancy for an old woman means that this is evidence of her following the desires and temptations of this world and turning away from God, and she must distance herself from her actions and repent to God. Pregnancy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of a lot of money, especially if the woman sees that her belly is large in the dream and she is about to Childbirth, but if she sees that she is giving birth through the mouth, then this is a bad vision and warns of the death of someone close to her. Seeing a pregnancy after performing the Istikhara prayer in a dream is a very bad vision and indicates many misfortunes in addition to the presence of many problems that cannot be solved, so it is best to stay away from it. God's request. If a person is actually about to achieve a project or an important step in life, and seeing a vision of pregnancy means achieving the goal and reaching it, but after a period of problems and difficulties in life. Joy and happiness as a result of observing pregnancy is evidence of improving living conditions and hearing good news. I dreamed I am pregnant. Ibn Sirin says that seeing pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman and being comfortable with it means that she is a girl devoted to the teachings of the Islamic religion and does not wish to commit sins. It means fearing God, adhering to the truth, and staying away from falsehood. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a pregnancy for an unmarried woman is praiseworthy and heralds the achievement of the desired goal and the fulfillment of the desire dear to her. Imam Nabulsi differed in interpreting pregnancy for an unmarried woman, saying: It is a great worry and sadness, and if she cries and cries This means that she has fallen into a great sin and disobedience. What is the interpretation of pregnancy with a boy in a single woman’s dream? For an unmarried woman to dream of a boy is a vision that does not bring her any good, as it is evidence of the psychological pressures and problems that she is experiencing. If she is waiting for the test result, it means failure, failure, and

title: Interpretation of being late for school in a dream: I dreamed that I was late for school

preview.html: Seeing being late for school in a dream indicates fear, anxiety, and other dreams, such as being late for an exam, being late for class, or not showing up to class. Interpretation of being late for school in a dream: The dream of being late to school, for a single woman who has been out of school for a period of time, It may indicate that she is thinking about some matters related to her private life, such as marriage or work, and her feeling may be delayed. Some things like commitment, and this can lead to feeling some anxiety. Being late for school in a dream has different meanings. A student or student who sees in his dreams that he is late for a semester, lesson, or lecture, suffers from severe anxiety that includes great fears of passing or failing an exam. Whereas a dream about an unmarried woman being late for school indicates that the date of marriage has been postponed or that she has exceeded the minimum threshold. For marriage, engagement or childbearing age.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing oneself being late for school in a dream indicates one's irrationality, and as a result, one may not reach one's dreams despite being close to them, and one will regret it. That is later after realizing the importance of the situation. But if he can make up for the delay and arrives on time, this expresses the wonderful engagement he will have, which can be related to work, but also to his private life. Dreaming about being late for school, for students and students, this dream It is the result of fears and anxiety about the school year and may also indicate a lack of confidence in the dreamer’s skills and abilities to keep up with the school year, and this dream may just be self-talk due to the pressures that may be present at school or university. The interpretation of seeing being late for school in a dream by Ibn Sirini is mentioned by an interpreter. Dreams by Muhammad bin Shirin that seeing being late for school indicates that the dreamer does not pay attention to his life because of his impulsiveness and haste, but after a while he calms down and enters the road. In search of work and in order not to be separated from his life, he will return to his community and return to meet his friends again.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? Balin

Dreaming about being late for school, for students and students, this dream It is the result of fears and anxiety about the school year and may also indicate a lack of confidence in the dreamer’s skills and abilities to keep up with the school year, and this dream may just be self-talk due to the pressures that may be present at school or university. The interpretation of seeing being late for school in a dream by Ibn Sirini is mentioned by an interpreter. Dreams by Muhammad bin Shirin that seeing being late for school indicates that the dreamer does not pay attention to his life because of his impulsiveness and haste, but after a while he calms down and enters the road. In search of work and in order not to be separated from his life, he will return to his community and return to meet his friends again.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');And for people who are not married yet, they will meet new people and be attracted to them quickly, but they will waste them away and when another opportunity to date comes, they will not take it They will regret this opportunity very much. title: Interpretation of betrayal in a dream or my lover deceives me in a dream

preview.html: A dream about betrayal shows doubt, anxiety, and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, or divorced husband, such as a lover or lover betraying her lover and seeing my husband cheating on me or cheating on me. The husband’s betrayal in front of his wife, according to Ibn Sirin and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of betrayal in a dream. Seeing betrayal indicates some rumors and gossip in married life, which will lead to problems between the spouses, such as disagreements and separation, but with God’s help, this person will get rid of these situations. Seeing betrayal does not It has nothing to do with betrayal in reality and its interpretation is as follows: Seeing a husband cheating in a dream is generally one of Satan’s whisperings between spouses. Seeing a husband cheating in a dream indicates doubt about something and the fear of failure or fulfilling your obligations. Seeing one of the spouses cheating in a dream may be the result of great jealousy. Which some husbands suffer from. Seeing a wife’s infidelity is evidence of her faith and loyalty to her husband, and seeing infidelity on the part of his fiancée is a sign that he expects a successful marriage. title: Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman: Seeing shoes has many meanings and symbols for whoever sees them, in different colors and shapes, especially if the dreamer is a single girl and sees herself buying shoes or getting them as a gift from a relative, so what are their interpretations? Experts in these cases; Are the accompanying signs good or warning of danger? Therefore, we will explain through our website the different connotations of this dream as follows. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman. Jurists have indicated many interpretations of seeing shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream and found that it is a good indicator of her good condition and achieving what she aims for. She hopes to achieve it. Whenever the shoe has a distinctive shape and high heel, it means that she will attend happy occasions and hear good news, which is often represented by her close marriage to the right person who will provide her with comfort and happiness. If the shoe is broken or old, this leads to memories of meeting a childhood friend or meeting a person with whom he had an emotional relationship in the past.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' ' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If a girl deals with reality and sees that she is buying new shoes, this indicates that her marriage is approaching and that she wants to stay with her fiancé forever; Because of her love for him and her intense attachment to him, but if she sees dirty shoes, this indicates signs of rudeness, which is one of the undesirable qualities. This woman must review her calculations before taking the step of marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. There are many symbols and connotations. Which the scholar Ibn Sirin explained to us about a girl seeing shoes during her sleep, as he showed that it is a sign of maturity, overcoming puberty, the tendency to form a personality, and creating successful social relationships. He must have rigor and perseverance in achieving the goals and ambitions he aspires to. Shoes in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate that she is starting a new life and moving to a better stage of her life. This may be by entering a new job that will be the beginning of her path towards a bright future full of success. And developments. Or she is about to get engaged or marry the person she wants as her life partner.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : { } }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The appearance of a girl in a dream is considered

title: Interpretation of a dream about a tree rising in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about climbing a tree indicates an increase in what is permissible and other meanings that we mention for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as climbing trees and climbing. An olive tree, a fig, or climbing a green tree by Ibn Sirin and others. Continuing the topic: Interpretation of climbing a tree in a dream. Seeing him climbing a tree in a dream indicates good things, especially in a person’s practical life. A lot of good will come to him, and this vision shows that the dreamer will achieve Success and his parents are proud of him. Climbing trees in a dream means that this person’s future will become bright and his livelihood and wealth will always come hand in hand. Climbing a tree in a dream means that every person will live what he wants and fulfill all his desires and aspirations. Dreaming of climbing trees suggests a sense of well-being and a state of mind You may feel exhausted from work, a relationship, or any other emotional burden, so you have to tell yourself to rearrange your time between work and rest.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? Climbing trees indicates lust and emotions, indicates the fulfillment of desires and suggests that What you thought was difficult at first, you will find to be worth your time and effort. Your dream of climbing a tree indicates solidity, strength, and a stable personality and indicates that you need more clarity in the situation.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : ' iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a genie in the form of a person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see the genie in the form of a man in a dream, we will explain what scholars have put into practice regarding the interpretation of the dream when you see the genie in the form of a man in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and commentators, not personal interpretations.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the genie in the form of a person in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of seeing the genie In the form of a man in a dream, it may indicate haters and envious people, and God knows the unseen. Where a married man’s vision may reflect the jinn in the form of a man, it may indicate someone who protects him and wishes him ill, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a genie in the form of a man, it may indicate This is due to a person who is jealous of her and waits for her, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees jeans in the shape of a colleague at work, this may be evidence of someone who has a grudge against her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing jinn in the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing jeans in the mosque in a dream. It may refer to enjoining good and forbidding evil, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees jeans in a dream in a mosque, this may be evidence of the commandment to worship, and God knows best. It may also indicate that jeans in the mosque abandon worship, and God knows the unseen. If he sees The dreamer, the jinn in the mosque, may resort to eating forbidden things, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams when I see jeans pulling me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing jeans pulling me in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this, except that seeing jeans can lead to theft or witchcraft, and God knows best. If a married woman sees jinn in a dream, this may be evidence of the man working with witchcraft or deception, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees jinn entering the house, they may be enemies. Or thieves, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a jinn hitting me in a dream. Struggling with jeans could represent enemies who want to harm the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see a jinn fighting and reciting the Qur’an, this may indicate enemies planning to destroy you, but getting closer to God saves the dreamer. When you see jeans hitting, this may indicate someone who wants to harm the dreamer. And God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees that she is hitting jeans in a dream, this may be evidence of the difficulty of getting enemies from her, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of feeding the jinn in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of feeding the jinn in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, it can be Dream interpretation A genie is chasing me, but I do not see him in a dream. A genie can chase you as you move from one country to another, which indicates instability, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if the dreamer sees a genie chasing him, he will turn around and travel from one place to another, and God knows best. In the event that

title: Interpretation of dreams about fingerprints and seeing fingerprints in a dream

preview.html: A dream about fingerprints indicates the completion of matters and other interpretations, such as seeing a thumbprint, or dreaming that I was making a fingerprint on a paper, or a handprint or fingerprints, and other interpretations for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation Fingerprint in a dream: Seeing a fingerprint in a dream indicates the completion of matters and their good conclusion, as well as an indication of requesting testimony. Anyone who sees accurate and legible fingerprints in a dream is a sign of his interest in something. Seeing a fingerprint in a dream indicates learning the details of some problems. And if If someone took your fingerprints in a dream, it is likely that you will become a member of a criminal case and be under the surveillance of investigative bodies. A dream about a fingerprint may indicate that someone is carefully watching you. If your hands remain dirty after taking fingerprints, the dream warns that you will participate in A dirty story and you will have to untangle it for a long time. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The spiritual meaning of the dream about fingerprints means that a difficult problem that has been bothering you for a long time will be successfully resolved. And if you look at someone's hand while making fingerprints, then this It means that it will be a new acquaintance of yours and there will be a strong friendship between you. If you examine the smallest details of the lines of your fingerprints in a dream, this means that you urgently need a person who will understand you in a blink of an eye, and at the present time it is impossible to get such a person for various reasons. If they are fingerprints Fingers do not match reality in your dream, this is a sign that you will find yourself in an unusual situation and lose courage. And if your fingerprint on paper is large, you will be happy to know that you will reach your goal very quickly. On the contrary, if the fingerprint is small in the dream , it means that the happy event you have been waiting for will be a quick joy and a series of problems will follow. Each fingerprint in a dream symbolizes a specific area of ​​your life. A fingerprint in a dream It represents your inner world and psychological comfort. Seeing the fingerprint of the index finger in a dream shows the dreamer’s relationships with the world around him. As for the imprint of the middle finger in a dream, it shows the true reality of family affairs. The imprint of the ring finger in a dream indicates the beginning of relationships with new people. Also, the imprint of the little finger in a dream represents your potential, opportunities, and ability to succeed.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ?
